code: class  Solution  {   public :   bool  canChoose ( vector < vector < int >>&  groups ,  vector < int >&  nums )  {   int  i  =  0 ;    int  j  =  0 ;    while  ( i  <  groups . size ()  &&  j  <  nums . size ())   if  ( isMatch ( groups [ i ],  nums ,  j ))  {   j  +=  groups [ i ]. size ();   ++ i ;   }  else  {   ++ j ;   }   return  i  ==  groups . size ();   }   private :     bool  isMatch ( const  vector < int >&  group ,  const  vector < int >&  nums ,  int  j )  {   if  ( j  +  group . size ()  >  nums . size ())   return  false ;   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  group . size ();  ++ i )   if  ( group [ i ]  !=  nums [ j  +  i ])   return  false ;   return  true ;   }  };
